text: This is a list of Danish television related events from 1999. ==Events== *13 March - Michael Teschl and Trine Jepsen are selected to represent Denmark at the 1999 Eurovision Song Contest with their song "Denne gang". They are selected to be the twenty-eighth Danish Eurovision entry during Dansk Melodi Grand Prix held at the DR Studios in Copenhagen. ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ==Ending this year== ==Births== ==Deaths== ==See also== *1999 in Denmark
title: 1999 in Danish television
